DataElement.preferredName: CARTOX-10 Point Neurological Assessment Performed Lowest Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of the CARTOX-10 point neurological lowest score.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10.

Concepts.definition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to CAR T therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CARTOX 10 Point Neurological Assessment Lowest Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A test to monitor for neurotoxicity related to chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy: orientation to year, month, city, hospital, and President; ability to name 3 specified objects; ability to write a standard sentence; ability to count backwards from 100 by 10._In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 0-2 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating severe neurotoxicity.

Concepts.definition: A score of 0-2 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating severe neurotoxicity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 3-6 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating moderate neurotoxicity.

Concepts.definition: A score of 3-6 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating moderate neurotoxicity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 7-9 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating mild neurotoxicity.

Concepts.definition: A score of 7-9 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating mild neurotoxicity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A score of 10 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating no neurotoxicity.

Concepts.definition: A score of 10 on the CARTOX-10 assessment, indicating no neurotoxicity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
